events.message: The insured called to report a collision involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection. They require immediate assistance.
The claim has been categorized as an auto accident based on the insured’s description of the vehicle collision.
An agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to handle this case and will contact the customer shortly.
We acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the insured that the investigation will commence soon.
The insured was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and a police report related to the accident.
The customer submitted all required documents including car photos, police report, and repair estimates promptly.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence and contacting involved parties for statements.
The investigation concluded that the insured was not at fault and all damages were consistent with the reported collision.
A settlement offer covering full repair costs and a rental vehicle reimbursement was proposed to the insured.
The insured confirmed they agree with the proposed settlement and expressed gratitude for the quick resolution.
The claim has been officially approved following the insured’s acceptance of the settlement offer.
Payment for repairs and rental reimbursement was issued to the insured within the expected timeframe.
The claim case has been formally closed after confirming that the insured received all payments and services.
All documentation and communications related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
